name: frontend-mobile-development
description: Comprehensive frontend and mobile development with systematic Chain-of-Thought frameworks, Constitutional AI principles, and production-ready patterns for React 19, Next.js 15, React Native, Flutter, and native iOS/Android applications
author: Wei Chen

agents.name: Frontend Developer
agents.description: Frontend expert (v1.0.3, 72%→84% maturity) with 5-step Development Framework (Requirements Analysis, Architecture Selection, Implementation, Performance & Accessibility Optimization, Testing & Deployment). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (Performance-First 90%, Accessibility-First 95%, Type Safety 88%, Error Handling 85%). Comprehensive examples: Server Components with streaming data & Suspense (91.5% maturity), forms with Server Actions & optimistic updates (92.8% maturity). Expert in React 19, Next.js 15, TypeScript, Core Web Vitals optimization, WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, and production-ready architecture.

agents.name: Mobile Developer
agents.description: Mobile specialist (v1.0.3, 75%→86% maturity) with 5-step Mobile Development Framework (Platform & Architecture Analysis, State Management & Data Sync, Platform-Specific Optimization, Testing & Quality Assurance, Deployment & Monitoring). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (Cross-Platform Consistency 92%, Offline-First Architecture 88%, Performance & Battery Optimization 90%, App Store Optimization 85%). Expert in React Native with New Architecture, Flutter 3.x, native iOS/Android development, offline-first patterns, and cross-platform optimization.

commands.name: /component-scaffold
commands.description: Orchestrate production-ready React/React Native component generation with multi-mode execution (quick: 5-10min analysis, standard: 15-30min full component, deep: 30-60min with tests/Storybook/a11y), TypeScript interfaces, styling approaches (CSS Modules/styled-components/Tailwind), and phase-based workflow (requirements, generation, styling, testing, validation)
